# Pull Request

## Summary
- What does this change do?
- Is it template-only, or does it alter sample domain logic?

## Type
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New template content
- [ ] Docs
- [ ] Refactor
- [ ] Other (describe)

## Testing
- [ ] `mvn test`
- [ ] `mvn clean package`
- [ ] Other (describe)

## Notes
- Breaking changes? If yes, describe.
- For framework issues, consider opening at https://github.com/Kingsrook/qqq

Reminder: this repo is a starter template meant to stay generic so downstream users can clone and customize.
